mapper.sql: id , is_delete, gmt_create, gmt_modified, user_name, token, global_trace_id
mapper.select: select user_name from user_token where is_delete = 0 and token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by id asc limit 1
select user_name from user_token where is_delete = 0 and global_trace_id = #{globalTraceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and user_name is not null order by id asc limit 1
select id, user_name from user_token where is_delete = 0 and global_trace_id = #{globalTraceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and user_name is null
select id, user_name from user_token where is_delete = 0 and token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and user_name is null
select user_name, token, global_trace_id from user_token where is_delete = 0 and token is not null and user_name is not null and global_trace_id is not null
select user_name from user_token where is_delete = 0 and global_trace_id = #{globalTraceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by id asc limit 1
select user_name, token from user_token where is_delete = 0 and user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by id desc limit 1
mapper.insert:
insert into user_token ( user_name, token, global_trace_id) values
( #{item.userName,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.globalTraceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
on duplicate key update user_name = values(user_name) , token = values(token) , global_trace_id = values(global_trace_id)
mapper.select:
select user_name, token, global_trace_id from user_token where is_delete = 0 and user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by id desc
LIMIT #{pageNo},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert:
insert into user_token
id,
is_delete,
gmt_create,
gmt_modified,
user_name,
token,
global_trace_id,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{globalTraceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
on duplicate key update user_name = values(user_name) , token = values(token) , global_trace_id = values(global_trace_id)
mapper.update:
update user_token
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
global_trace_id = #{globalTraceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
